attributes.action: name and sack the person responsible for declaring that members of the armed services can sell their stories to the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned consider the statement to allow members of Her Majesty's forces to sell their stories to the media to be a major government failure -and PR disater for the Royal Navy - and "heads should roll" at the highest level.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "name and sack the person responsible for declaring that members of the armed services can sell their stories to the media."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11475.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Navy-media/
